resources.string:
Welcome to %1$s! We really appreciate that you installed our application and hope you will enjoy it as much as we do.

Before you start, we would like you to take a moment and read the following terms and conditions for using %1$s.

By downloading, installing or using this application, you agree to the following:

1. All the information presented is provided by Yahoo! Finance and is delayed as specified by their guidelines.

2. We do not verify the accuracy of the information and disclaim any obligation to do so.

3. We shall not be liable for any errors, omissions or other defects in the information presented.

4. All the information is provided "as is" for personal information purposes only, and it's not intended for trading purposes or advise. Please consult a financial representative to verify the accuracy of the information before executing any trade.

5. We do not guarantee the presented information and shall not be liable for any loss caused by the use of this application.

Love %1$s? Ready for an upgrade?

The HD version of the application includes more exciting features and no ads, plus more than %2$s stock tickers over %3$s market exchanges (NASDAQ, NYSE, HKSE, LSE, and Mutual Funds).

Go ahead and check it out on the Google Play Store!

You appear to be offline, so we can\'t retrieve the latest market information for %1$s.\r\n\r\nHowever, the ticker will be added to your watch list, and as soon as you come back online we are going to update it\'s market information.
There are no stock tickers containing the words \"%1$s\" in either their symbol or company name.\r\n\r\nMake sure you spelled your query correctly and try again.
